abstract:
Integration of a Large Text and Audio Corpus Using Speaker
Identification
Deb Roy
Carl Malamud
MIT Media Laboratory
20 Ames Street, E15-388
Cambridge, MA 02139
dkroy@media.mit.edu
carl@media.mit.edu
Abstract
We report on an audio retrieval system which lets
Internet users efficiently access a large text and audio
corpus containing the transcripts and recordings of the
proceedings of the United States House of
Representatives.  The audio has been temporally
aligned to corresponding text transcrip
